scripts.heroku-prebuild: export NPM_CONFIG_PRODUCTION=false; export NODE_ENV=; NPM_CONFIG_PRODUCTION=false NODE_ENV=development npm install --only=dev --dev
scripts.heroku-postbuild: export NPM_CONFIG_PRODUCTION=true; export NODE_ENV=production; cd client && npm install && npm run build
scripts.develop: concurrently --kill-others-on-fail "npm run server" "npm run start --prefix client"
scripts.start: concurrently --kill-others-on-fail "npm run server" "npm run start --prefix client"
